title: CANT CONNECT AFTER CRASHING
body: I was in the middle of my game when i crashed, so i restarted my pc and turned on league i waited a little for the league "game" to pop up nothing came up, and on the client it just says game in progress and no buttons to let me reconnect.  RIOT PLEASE FIX UR GAME PLEASEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any bugs that would cause this issue. This is commonly caused as a result of a *poor or unstable connection* to our gameservers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are properly setup for League.

Let me know if this was unable to resolve the issue.
